original_text: And she named the child Ichabod, saying, The glory is departed from Israel: because the ark of God was taken, and because of her father in law and her husband.
korean_text: 이르기를 영광이 이스라엘에서 떠났다 하고 아이 이름을 이가봇이라 하였으니 하나님의 궤가 빼앗겼고 그의 시아버지와 남편이 죽었기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: And she named the child Ichabod
saying, The glory is departed from Israel
because the ark of God was taken
and because of her father in law and her husband
